title: Integration test 'test-host'
body:
### Describe the bug

As described in the latest [documentation](https://quarkus.io/guides/getting-started-testing#executing-against-a-running-application), I'm trying to execute the tests against a running application, using the command `./mvnw verify -Dquarkus.http.test-host=1.2.3.4 -Dquarkus.http.test-port=4321`.

This command fails, and returns the following error:  _Unrecognized configuration key "quarkus.http.test-host" was provided; it will be ignored; verify that the dependency extension for this configuration is set or that you did not make a typo_

I'm running this command in the [official getting-started project](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus-quickstarts/tree/main/getting-started-testing)

### Expected behavior

_No response_
